channel.title: blog on Fronkon Games
channel.description: Recent content in blog on Fronkon Games

item.title: Introduction To Go
item.description: Go is a very old strategy game that consists of capturing pieces and winning territories. It is about 2,500 years old and was invented in China, although the exact location is unknown.

item.title: Design Patterns In Game Development
item.description: The solution is reusable and can be used to solve similar problems. In this article we are going to focus on design patterns focused on video game programming.

item.title: Unity Is A Harsh Mistress ðŸ’”
item.description: UPDATE (10/10/2023) Today it was announced that John Riccitiello is stepping down from all of his positions at Unity: President, CEO, Chairman and member of the board of directors.
